resources.string: 1. During the summer of 2011 Leeds goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel left the club to go elsewhere, but which club did he join? (1 choice)
2. Which turkish club did former Leeds player Harry Kewell join in 2008, which caused an uproar amongst Leeds supporters? (1 choice)
3. In which country would you find the world\'s largest football stadium (by capacity)? (1 choice)
4. Which country was Oliver Dacourt born in?
5. The current record win for Leeds United in the European Cup currently stands at 10-0 since 2010, but which team did they record this win against?
6. Which club did Leeds player Robbie Fowler go to at the end of the 2001-2002 season? (1 choice)
7. What is the name of Arsenal\'s mascot? (1 choice)
8. Which club have won the most Serie A titles? (1 choice)
9. Which club was former Leeds Unted player Eric Cantona sold to in 1992? (1 choice)
10. Which country did former Leeds United man Lucas Radebe originally come from?
